meanings.sent1: The magician made the rabbit disappear from the hat.
meanings.sent2: The sun will disappear behind the clouds.
meanings.sent3: I tried to make my vegetables disappear by feeding them to the dog.
meanings.sent4: The stars disappear as the city lights brighten the sky.
meanings.sent5: The ghostly figure seemed to disappear into thin air.

meanings.sent1: The hiker watched the trail disappear around the bend.
meanings.sent2: The ship will disappear over the horizon.
meanings.sent3: I made my brother disappear during hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The memories of childhood disappear like footprints in the sand.
meanings.sent5: The music fades, and the notes disappear into the night.
